script.name: plugin.autotrade.getroute.long
script.description: ST LT UT: Get good trade route
script.sourceplaintext:
* SymTec (19-03-09): * extracted from autotrade.local
$text = read text: page=6020 id=2092 [THIS] ->set command extra display override: text=$text @ = wait randomly from 3000 to 5000 ms
$sector.blacklist = table alloc @ $ware.sectorlist = [THIS] -> call script !lib.get.products.insector : Sector=$startsector if $experience >= 5 @ $sector.blacklist = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.blacklistsector : Add Sector=null end
* get llist of availble wares $products = get all available products in universe $table.tech = table alloc $table.bio = table alloc $table.energy = table alloc $table.weapons = table alloc $i = size of array $products while $i dec $i = $ware = $products[$i] $maintype = get maintype of ware $ware if $maintype == [SSTYPE_W_TECH] if not is equipment: ware=$ware if not is upgrade: ware=$ware $subtype = sprintf: fmt='%s', $ware, null, null, null, null if get length of string $subtype $table.tech[$ware] = [TRUE] end end end else if $maintype == [SSTYPE_W_BIO] OR $maintype == [SSTYPE_W_FOOD] OR $maintype == [SSTYPE_W_MINERALS] $table.bio[$ware] = [TRUE] else if $maintype == [SSTYPE_LASER] OR $maintype == [SSTYPE_MISSILE] OR $maintype == [SSTYPE_SHIELD] $table.weapons[$ware] = [TRUE] else if $maintype == [SSTYPE_W_ENERGY] $table.energy[$ware] = [TRUE] end end
* end fix if [THIS] -> is of class Freighter $perc.sector = 35 $perc.tech = 20 $perc.energy = 8 $perc.weapon = 12 * bio, food, minerals: 25% else $perc.sector = 25 $perc.tech = 35 $perc.energy = 5 $perc.weapon = 30 * bio, food, minerals: 5% end
* Special vars $buystation = null $sellstation = null $ware = null $Debug = null $i = 1
dockingcheck: * If already docked check if we can use the product
if [ENVIRONMENT] -> is of class Factory $ware = [DOCKEDAT] -> get product ware $productprice = [DOCKEDAT] -> get price of ware $ware $avgprice = get average price of ware $ware $buystation = [DOCKEDAT] $sellstation = null
if $productprice < $avgprice $avgprice = $productprice + 1 end if $Debug > 1 write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s Docking Check --%s- ware %s value greater than %s Cr.', [THIS], [DOCKEDAT], $ware, $avgprice, null end
if $productprice >= $avgprice $buystation = null $ware = null end end
selectware: @ = wait 1 ms
* start of main script loop $NumberOfTries = 50 + ( $experience * 5 ) while $buystation == null OR $sellstation == null $sellstation = null
* Stops after N tries if $i >= $NumberOfTries goto label return end @ = wait randomly from 100 to 1000 ms
* If script fails to find a ware and sellers as well as buyers then abort inc $i = if $buystation == null
$Dice = random value from 0 to 100 - 1 * ST use sectorlist if $range == 0 $Dice = 0 skip if size of array $ware.sectorlist goto label return do if $sector.blacklist[[SECTOR]] goto label return end
if $Dice <= $perc.sector + $perc.tech * Tech/Wares in Sector (with ware.***list for quick searching) if $Dice <= $perc.sector $subtype = size of array $ware.sectorlist if $subtype $subtype = random value from 0 to $subtype - 1 $ware = $ware.sectorlist[$subtype] remove element from array $ware.sectorlist at index $subtype end else $ware = get random key: table=$table.tech remove key $ware from table $table.tech end else if $Dice <= $perc.sector + $perc.tech + $perc.energy * Level 0. Energy $table = $table.energy else if $Dice <= $perc.sector + $perc.tech + $perc.energy + $perc.weapon * Level 3. Missiles, Shield, Lasers $table = $table.weapons else * Level 1. Bio, Food, Mineral $table = $table.bio end $ware = get random key: table=$table remove key $ware from table $table end skip if is datatype[ $ware ] == DATATYPE_WARE continue $avgprice = get average price of ware $ware
if $Debug > 2 write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s chosen. Maintype is %s, Subtype is %s, %s of %s tries.', $ware, $maintype, $subtype, $i, $NumberOfTries end end
* find buystation [THIS] ->set wanted ware to $ware if [THIS] -> can transport ware $ware $ware.volume = get volume of ware $ware
$amount = $freecargo / ( 2 * $ware.volume ) do if $amount == 0 goto label return
* Find a station to buy the ware from if not $buystation $buystation = find station: product $ware with best price: max.price=$avgprice, amount=$amount, max.jumps=$range, startsector=$startsector, trader=[THIS], exclude array=$sector.blacklist end if not $buystation $buystation = find station: product $ware with best price: max.price=$avgprice, amount=2, max.jumps=$range, startsector=$startsector, trader=[THIS], exclude array=$sector.blacklist end * This will check Trading Stations as well if not $buystation $buystation = find station sells: resource $ware with best price: max.price=$avgprice, amount=2, max.jumps=$range, startsector=$startsector, trader=[THIS], exclude array=$sector.blacklist end if $buystation -> exists $bl.sector = $buystation -> get sector if $buystation -> only player own ships can trade with $sector.blacklist[$buystation] = [TRUE] $buystation = null @ else if not [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.checkvalidroute : Destination Sector=$bl.sector Allow Target=[FALSE] Command Rejected Sound=[FALSE] @ = wait 10 ms $sector.blacklist[$bl.sector] = [TRUE] $buystation = null end end end
* find sellstation if $buystation != null $productprice = $buystation -> get price of ware $ware if $experience >= 15 $avgprice = $productprice + 1 else if $productprice >= $avgprice $avgprice = $productprice + 1 end
* local trader use absolute sector range, UT use relative range $Buystation.sektor = $buystation -> get sector do if $range == $sellrange $Buystation.sektor = $startsector
$sellstation = find station: resource $ware with best price: min.price=$avgprice, amount=$amount, max.jumps=$sellrange, startsector=$Buystation.sektor, trader=[THIS], exclude array=$sector.blacklist if not $sellstation $sellstation = find station: resource $ware with best price: min.price=$avgprice, amount=2, max.jumps=$sellrange, startsector=$Buystation.sektor, trader=[THIS], exclude array=$sector.blacklist end
if $sellstation -> exists $sellstation.owner = $sellstation -> get owner race if $sellstation.owner == Player $station.money = $sellstation -> get money $station.price = $sellstation -> get price of ware $ware if ( $station.price * $amount ) > $station.money $sector.blacklist[$sellstation] = [TRUE] $sellstation = null end end end
if $sellstation -> exists $bl.sector = $sellstation -> get environment @ if not [THIS] -> call script !lib.player.checkvalidroute : Destination Sector=$bl.sector Allow Target=[FALSE] Command Rejected Sound=[FALSE] $sector.blacklist[$sellstation] = [TRUE] $sellstation = null @ = wait 10 ms end end
$Buystation.sektor = $buystation -> get sector do if $sellstation $Sellstation.sector = $sellstation -> get sector
* precalculation of profit if $buystation AND $sellstation $profit.min = 300 skip if $sellrange == 0 $profit.min = 5000 skip if $i < 40 $profit.min = 2000 skip if $i < 80 $profit.min = 500 skip if $i < 120 $profit.min = 300
@ $preprofit = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.profit : buystation=$buystation sellstation=$sellstation Ware=$ware
if $Debug > 2 write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s --- calculated profit %s for ware %s. Needed profit is %s.', [THIS], $preprofit, $ware, $profit.min, null write to player logbook: printf: type=[Log.Normal], fmt='%s --- Buystation is %s (Range %s), Sellstation is %s (Range %s).', [THIS], $buystation, $range, $sellstation, $sellrange end
skip if $preprofit >= $profit.min $buystation = null end
@ if [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.checksector : Startstation=$buystation Targetstation=$sellstation * Only very experienced traders use radio messages, and trading lists if $experience >= 11 @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.blacklistsector : Add Sector=$buystation Is Local=[FALSE] @ = [THIS] -> call script plugin.autotrade.blacklistsector : Add Sector=$sellstation Is Local=[FALSE] end else $buystation = null end
* if there is no buystation for the selected ware chose different ware if not $buystation AND $sellstation $buystation = null $sellstation = null end end end
return: $ret = null if $buystation AND $sellstation AND $ware $ret = create new array, arguments=$buystation, $sellstation, $ware, $preprofit, null end return $ret

get all available products in universe

if there is no buystation for the selected ware chose different ware
